div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

p.strong: Please be aware that we take pride in the safety of our district and will use whatever force necessary to protect our students.

div.p: Muleshoe ISD is ready for meal distribution. Please drive through and get your meals for today, April 23 and tomorrow. ...
We have over 100 meal bags left. We would love to give them out!
Muleshoe ISD will begin meal distribution at 9:15 this morning. We look forward to seeing you. Muleshoe ISD comenzará ...

Muleshoe ISD
514 W. Ave G
Muleshoe, TX 79347
Phone: (806) 272-7400
